name: aretae-sommelier
description: A mobile-first wine cellar app with AI sommelier chat

scripts.dev:e2e: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_USE_FIREBASE_EMULATOR=1 NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1 NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_PORT=9099 NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_PORT=8080 NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_STORAGE_EMULATOR_PORT=9199 NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_API_KEY=fake-api-key NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN=localhost NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID=demo-aretae-sommelier NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET=demo-aretae-sommelier.appspot.com NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID=fake-sender NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREBASE_APP_ID=fake-app npm run dev
scripts.test:e2e:emulator: cross-env E2E_WITH_FIREBASE_EMULATOR=1 firebase emulators:exec --only auth,firestore,storage --project demo-aretae-sommelier "playwright test e2e/emulator"
